LanguageData.JRWSarcosuchus.label: Sarcosuchus
LanguageData.JRWSarcosuchus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #03829-1966 [SARCOSUCHUS IMPERATOR] CODENAME: BEARTRAP >082
A humongous crocodyliform with an elongated snout and a extremely powerful bite. Several rows of razor sharp teeth allow this creature to shred unsuspecting prey to pieces before sending them to a watery grave.
